AccordionDetails: 写一个简单的contract，包含一个数据类型为uint的参数，包含一个function,写一个modifier，并用到function上

private means it's only callable from other functions inside the contract; internal is like private but can also be called by contracts that inherit from this one; external can only be called outside the contract; and finally public(默认) can be called anywhere, both internally and externally.
1.不消耗gas 2.view是只读取不改变数据  3.pure不读取区块链数据，仅依赖函数本身的参数
address 类型有两种：address 和 address payable
